attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP
attributes.review: App doesn’t work. Glitches. Ugly fonts. Terrible app design. Ugly orange man that pops up. Please don’t ruin the app store by allowing apps like these. Make the App Store great again.

attributes.title: tik tok gen Z
attributes.review: thank you to all the gen z supporters willing to help take down this app. we are here to take down his app before he takes down ours!!!🧚🏽‍♀️💞🦸🏽‍♀️

attributes.title: worst app ever.
attributes.review: yup i am here because i hate donald trump and i am part of the “gen z cancel donald trump group” i guess you can say and i just don’t see how he really helped our country and what he has done to serve. and if someone cocked at him sideways in the slittiest but he try his best to take them down it’s wrong and childish.

attributes.title: Terrible functionality & a lot of misinformation
attributes.review: Hard to use and a lot of misinformation

attributes.title: horrible app!!
attributes.review: this app was glitchy and i’m scared they are going to give me a bug! i will not let my children or anyone i know get this app, i would not recommend. lots of ads, always glitched out, and tremendously horrible graphics. for the love of our lord and savior please do not download this app!!!

attributes.title: Wish I could rate it lower
attributes.review: This app is trash. Nothing works. Don’t even waste your time. Trump can’t make a good app. He can’t lead a country. FIRED.

attributes.title: Gen z is superior
attributes.review: This app was horrible. I was promised a monkey but instead I just had to listen to a soggy Cheeto puff. 0 out of ten wouldn’t recommend.

attributes.title: Terrible App
attributes.review: This app is slower than a sloth. It crashes every time you get on it and it is overall a crappy app🤬

attributes.title: i Hate it
attributes.review: stupid orange man😔 failed me like he failed the U.S. but it’s okay he will be leaving soon hopefully. I wish I can give it 0 stars but noooo:(

attributes.title: Scary💀
attributes.review: When I first got on there I thought it was gonna be normal but then I sawl it a big fat 🍊I was so scare I could not sleep for 2 weeks
